ThingDef.label: royal salve
ThingDef.description:
A luxuriant balm of aloe vera enriched with rare royal insect jelly. Silken in texture and radiant in hue, this salve is prized for its ability to treat infections.

<color=#E5E54C>Trade considerations:</color>

<color=#E5E54C>Ingredients:</color> Making 10 royal salves requires 10 aloe vera salves and 5 royal insect jelly for a total value of 140, and sells for 25, giving a <color=#33CC33>44%</color> profit per unit.

<color=#E5E54C>Value per work:</color> Recipe requires 1000 work, which results on a value per work of <color=#33CC33>0.25</color>.

<color=#E5E54C>Caravan trading:</color> Its weight is 0.05 Kg, for a value per Kg of <color=#33CC33>500</color>.

<color=#E5E54C>Profit per day:</color> On average, and assuming a constant royal insect jelly source, profit per day is <color=#33CC33>0.85</color> (for reference Yayo is 0.35).

<color=#E5E54C>Extra use:</color> Royal salves can be applied to reduce the severity of an infection by 5%.
